description: This source file implements the core functions for a pointer array object component, including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization. It manages memory allocation, object lifecycle, and provides method definitions related to the array functionalities within a component-based software system.

classes.name: ANSC_PTR_ARRAY_OBJECT
classes.description: The main data structure representing the pointer array object, including its methods and properties.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscPtrArrayCOCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new pointer array component object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscPtrArrayCORemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the pointer array component object, freeing associated memory.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscPtrArrayCOEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls or registers necessary sub-objects or components required by the array object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscPtrArrayCOInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the member variables and methods of the pointer array object.
